I came to eat here 3 times and rarely go back to the same restaurant when I'm travelling.  The food here is fresh and delicious.  You can accompany it with a glass of wine or cold Estrella.  My favorite dishes are the grilled shrimp, gazpacho, machego, and gnocchi.  The shrimps come out grilled and whole and incredibly fresh.  The Gnocchi are fluffy heavenly pillows that melt in your mouth.  I'm going to miss this place.
